price: (Sε εnyε Adiyisεm a Nyankopͻn ayi akyerε me a, anka) me nni ͻsoro nhemfo (abͻfoͻ) no ho nimdeε wͻ εberε a na wͻregye (Adam ho) nkyingyeε no.
arabic: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنۡ عِلۡمِۭ بِٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā kāna liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i al-aʿlā idh yakhtaṣimūna
